tweets.text: Heard from sources that the @EnvAgency are planning to radically change their pollution response procedure. Will now only attend serious pollution incidents. Begs the question define serious & how would they know if they do not attend? Replace one broken system with another.

I've heard the @EnvAgency are surprised NGOs are refusing to work with them.

Why?

The River Avon catchment is comprised of 5 chalk streams protected as SSSI and SAC. In 2020 @wessexwater spent 26,916 hours dumping sewage into the river.

https://t.co/zslGdsV3lC

tweets.text:
They've admitted this is happening but refuse to take strong enough action to stop it. 
This has to be the big question. 
Are @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @PHE_uk  using the people of Newcastle under Lyme as guinea pigs. Tell me another reason why they wont stop this. https://t.co/p4rXDi8c1K

@StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids There is something going on it‚Äôs evening early morning and weekends, what are they able to do in operating hours that they can‚Äôt do when there not? As there is definitely something going on and we are suffocating with it
@RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids Why is it always worse at weekend? This cannot be a coincidence, it's every weekend!

Walleys Quarry landfill will be restarting ‚Äòfull operations‚Äô from Monday. 

Red Industries says it‚Äôs been planned in full consultation with @EnvAgency

It put a pause on accepting most waste in March and has been found to have breached it‚Äôs permit 5 times since mid-Feb. https://t.co/AKbc0O8z43

#SaturdayMorning can‚Äôt talk this morning my throat is swollen my voice is raspy the gas has engulfed my home for 12 and counting is this short term? Slept on & off all night @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MattHancock #StopTheStink give me back my life @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA  It may be complete but we are still breathing in poisonous gases. So what‚Äôs next? More statements or are you going to do the right thing and close it down? #StopTheStink

@EnvAgencyMids I'm fed up of you saying there's unlikely to be 'long-term' health impacts. What about our stress & anxiety levels? Sleep deprivation? Our inability to go outside for exercise? I've cried every day this week because the odour has worsened. We've had no respite from this hell.

Unless you live here nobody understands the extent of this environmental disaster. It‚Äôs more than a stink, it‚Äôs toxic gases @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @Greenpeace @EnvAgency @PHE_uk https://t.co/7ZAbWTW4CM

tweets.text:
UPDATE 8/5/21 from @SFRS_GWilliams 
We are expecting the smoke plume to increase and decrease through the day due to activities. This will be monitored by partners for air quality and also the impacts on the M54. @shropsfire @TelfordWrekin @BBCShropshire @EnvAgency @bbcmtd https://t.co/cgI2GeY57u

Charities are stepping in to save children living in Newcastle under Lyme. Schools are sending letters about how toxic landfill gas is affecting children‚Äôs education. The situation is escalating. Yet @EnvAgencyMids is allowing waste back on site at Walley‚Äôs Quarry. #stopthestink https://t.co/SchV09qw1x
Thanks for nothing @EnvAgency it stinks in #newcastleunderlyme tonight. @StinkStopthe

@EnvAgencyMids Whatever we all know it‚Äôs not and still billowing out h2s and goes knows what we can‚Äôt smell . Don‚Äôt waste our time ! One very angry , tired and worried resident in a community exactly the same .

"The site has been breached for discharges from storm tanks during non-storm conditions."

In English. Berkhamsted STW is operating illegally by dumping sewage into the River Bulbourne, a chalk stream, 1 of only 225 in the entire world.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/SCyPhZUuaR

Last night was off the scale, thanks to @NewsNBC for coming out to assess our street. Hazardous to health & an absolute misery to live in. Starting to despise where we live now & that‚Äôs really sad @capitoff #stopthestink @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock https://t.co/BANTAUBXmA

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids what you need is to close it completely and start prosecuting. Enough of this messing around.
